Class Room

java.lang.Object
Room
Direct Known Subclasses:
Deluxe, Executive
public class Room extends Object
Represents a room in a hotel with attributes and availability management.

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(String roomName)
      Constructor to initialize a Room with a given room name. Sets base price to a default value and initializes availability as true.
      Parameters:
      roomName - The name of the room.

  • Method Details

    • updatePrice

      public void updatePrice(double newPrice)

    • changeAvailability

      public void changeAvailability(boolean status)
      Changes the availability status of the room.
      Parameters:
      status - The new availability status (true if available, false otherwise).

    • getRoomType

      public String getRoomType()
      Retrieves the base price of the room.
      Returns:
      The base price of the room.

      Retrieves the base price of the room.
      Returns:
      The base price of the room.

    • getRoomName

      public String getRoomName()
      Retrieves the name of the room.
      Returns:
      The name of the room.

    • getAvailability

      public boolean getAvailability()
      Retrieves the availability status of the room.
      Returns:
      true if the room is available, false otherwise.

    • getDatesAvailable

      public ArrayList<Integer> getDatesAvailable(Room room, ArrayList<Reservation> reservations)
      Retrieves a list of available dates for booking this room. Checks reservations to determine dates when the room is not available.
      Parameters:
      room - The Room object to check availability for.
      reservations - List of Reservation objects to check against.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of available dates (days of the month).

    • setPriceModifier

      public void setPriceModifier(double rate, int day)
      Sets a price modifier for a specific day.
      Parameters:
      rate - The modifier rate to apply.
      day - The day of the month (1-31) to set the modifier.

    • getModifiers

      public double[] getModifiers()
      Retrieves the array of price modifiers for each day.
      Returns:
      The array of price modifiers.
